matrix.factory

Class FactoryMatrixThreshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrix.factory.FactoryMatrixThreshold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FactoryMatrix

    public class FactoryMatrixThreshold
extends java.lang.Object
implements FactoryMatrix
    This class creates a matrix that dynamically changes it representation between MatrixFloat and MatrixSparseHash
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel
    See Also:
    MatrixThreshold, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FactoryMatrixThreshold()
      Creates the factory with a threshold defined in Configuration.
